ARAssetManagerOperation Class Reference

Properties

id
< ARAssetManagerOperationDelegate > 		delegate
ARAsset * asset

Detailed Description

Operation class that loads a specific asset.

Member Function Documentation

- (id) initWithAsset: (ARAsset *)  asset  

Initializes the receiver with the given asset.

Parameters:
asset The asset this operation should load.
Returns:
The receiver.
- (void) notifyDidFinishWithData: (NSData *)  data  

Notifies the delegate that the asset data has been loaded.

Parameters:
data The data that has been loaded.
Note:
This is a helper method that can be used with performSelectorOnMainThread.
- (void) notifyDidFinishWithError: (NSError *)  error  

Notifies the delegate that the asset data has failed to load.

Parameters:
error The error that occured, which may be nil.
Note:
This is a helper method that can be used with performSelectorOnMainThread.

Property Documentation

- (ARAsset *) asset [read, assign]

The asset that this operation is responsible for.

- (id< ARAssetManagerOperationDelegate >) delegate [read, write, assign]

The delegate that is notified when the operation finishes.
